card.name: Phoenix
card.property: Psionic Bond − Hero Resource: Remove 1 power counter from Phoenix Force → generate a [wild] resource. (Limit once per phase).

alternate.name: Jean Grey
alternate.property: Setup: Put your Phoenix Force upgrade into play, [[RESTRAINED]] side faceup. Place 4 power counters on it.\n[star]Response: After you make a basic recovery, place 1 power counter on Phoenix Force.

card.name: Phoenix Force A
card.property: Permanent.\nYou gain the [[RESTRAINED]] trait.\nForced Response: After the last power counter is removed from here, flip this card.

alternate.name: Phoenix Force B
alternate.property: Permanent. You gain the [[UNLEASHED]] trait. Phoenix gets -2 THW and +2 ATK. Forced Response: After a power counter is placed here, if there are 4 or more power counters here, flip this card.

card.name: Cyclops
card.property: Response: After Cyclops enters play, place 2 power counters on Phoenix Force.\nResponse: When Cyclops leaves play, remove 2 power counters from Phoenix Force.

card.name: White Hot Room
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust White Hot Room → choose:\• Place 1 power counter on Phoenix Force.\n• Heal 2 damage from Jean Grey.

card.name: Phoenix Suit
card.property: Phoenix gains the [[AERIAL]] trait.\nWhile you have the [[RESTRAINED]] trait, you gain steady.\nWhile you have the [[UNLEASHED]] trait, you gain retaliate 1.

card.name: Rise from the Ashes
card.property: Interrupt: When you would be defeated, remove this card from the game → ready your identity and restore it to its printed hit point value instead. Remove each power counter from Phoenix Force.

card.name: Telekinetic Shield
card.property: Attach to a friendly character.\nForced Interrupt: When attached character would take damage from an enemy attack, place that damage here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard Telekinetic Shield.

card.name: Mental Paralysis
card.property: Hero form only. Attach to a non-[[ELITE]] minion.\nAttached minion cannot activate.\nForced Interrupt: After you flip to alter-ego form, discard this card.

card.name: Mind Control
card.property: Attach to a non-[[ELITE]] minion.\nTake control of attached minion and treat it as a [[CONTROLLED]] ally with a blank text box. Its THW is equal to its printed SCH and it takes 1 consequential damage after it thwarts or attacks.

card.name: Telekinetic Attack
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you have the [[UNLEASHED]] trait, this attack deals 2 additional damage and gains overkill.

card.name: Psychic Blast
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 4 damage to the villain. If you have the [[UNLEASHED]] trait, deal 4 damage to each minion angaged with you.

card.name: Telepathic Trickery
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. If you have the [[UNLEASHED]] trait, stun and confuse an enemy.

card.name: Phoenix Firebird
card.property: Hero Action: Choose:\• Remove 1 power counter from Phoenix Force → ready Phoenix.\n• Place 2 power counters on Phoenix Force.

card.name: Banshee
card.property: [star]Response: After Banshee thwarts, confuse a minion.

card.name: Marvel Girl
card.property: [star]Interrupt: When Marvel Girl Attacks a minion, remove X threat from the main scheme, where X is that minion's printed SCH.

card.name: Mission Training
card.property: Attach to an [[X-MEN]] ally. Max 1 [[TRAINING]] upgrade per ally.\nAttached ally gets +1 THW point and +2 hit points.

card.name: Psychic Manipulation
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[PSIONIC]] trait.Interrupt (thwart): When the villain schemes, this activation removes threat instead of placing it.

card.name: Mutant Peacekeepers
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait.Hero Action (thwart): Exhaust your hero and any number of [[X-MEN]] allies → remove X threat from among schemes in play, where X is the total THW of those characters.

card.name: Swift Retribution
card.property: Hero Action (attack): The villain schemes. Deal 4 damage to the villain.

card.name: Passion for Justice
card.property: Max 2 per deck.\nInterrupt: When you spend this card to play a [[THWART]] event, that event removes 1 additionnal threat.

card.name: Storm
card.property: Reduce the cost to play Storm by 1 if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] or [[X-MEN]] trait.\n[star]Interrupt: When Storm thwarts a scheme, move 2 threat from that scheme to another scheme.

card.name: Cerebro
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] trait.\nAlter-Ego Action: Exhaust Cerebro → search the top 5 cards of your deck for an [[X-MEN]] ally (search your whole deck instead if you control a [[PSIONIC]] character) and add that ally to your hand. (Shuffle.)

card.name: Down Time
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.\nYour alter-ego gets +2 REC.

card.name: Psychic Assault
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[PSIONIC]] trait.\nHero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Confuse that enemy.

card.name: Psychic Misdirection
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[PSIONIC]] trait.\nHero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks you, choose a different enemy → damage from that attack is dealt to the chosen enemy instead of you.

card.name: Psychic Kicker
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[PSIONIC]] trait.\nHero Action: Ready an ally. That ally gets +2 THW and +2 ATK for its next basic thwart or attack action this phase.

card.name: Soul Sisters
card.property: Team-Up (Phoenix and Storm). Max 1 per deck.\nHero Action: Ready Phoenix and Storm. Heal 2 damage from each of them.

card.name: Dark Phoenix
card.property: Steady. Toughness. Villainous.

card.name: Consume the World
card.property: Permanent.

card.name: Fiery Rage
card.property: Peril.
